channel.title: BMS crashes when I try to hit a level load trigger
channel.description: Hello, I just got to the point in BMS after you fire the test rocket and kill the 3-tentacled monster. Whenever I go down the ladder in the pit, the game crashes when I hit the level load trigger. I was having so much fun :'( More info: It crashes whether I fall down the pit or go slowly down the ladder. I have tried loading from multiple saves and nothing has fixed the issue. Please help! Attached: the most recent .dmp crash file. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T21_38_16C0.mdmp (93.6 KB)

item.title: BMS crashes when I try to hit a level load trigger
item.dc:creator: RalphORama
item.description:
Hello,

I just got to the point in BMS after you fire the test rocket and kill the 3-tentacled monster. Whenever I go down the ladder in the pit, the game crashes when I hit the level load trigger.

I was having so much fun :â€™(

More info: It crashes whether I fall down the pit or go slowly down the ladder. I have tried loading from multiple saves and nothing has fixed the issue. Please help!
